p: At a press conference held on February 7 th, researchers Shen Yongyi and Xiao Lihua from the South China Agricultural University in Guangzhou reported that they compared the coronavirus sequences from the pangolins to those of the recent outbreak and found them virtually identical. This work, currently submitted for publication, might assign the pangolin a role as an intermediate host between a bat reservoir and the human outbreak, in analogy to the role that palm civets played in the SARS epidemic.
